mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.imp_id AS "impId", a.name AS "name", a.type AS "type", a.groups AS "groups", a.leader AS "leader", a.office AS "office", a.profes AS "profes", a.mobile AS "mobile", a.steachers AS "steachers", a.eteachers AS "eteachers", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.huojiang AS "huojiang", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM gcontest_error a
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC

SELECT
FROM gcontest_error a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gcontest_error( id, imp_id, name, type, groups, leader, office, profes, mobile, steachers, eteachers, remarks, huojiang, update_date, update_by, create_date, create_by ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{impId}, #{name}, #{type}, #{groups}, #{leader}, #{office}, #{profes}, #{mobile}, #{steachers}, #{eteachers}, #{remarks}, #{huojiang}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE gcontest_error SET imp_id = #{impId}, name = #{name}, type = #{type}, groups = #{groups}, leader = #{leader}, office = #{office}, profes = #{profes}, mobile = #{mobile}, steachers = #{steachers}, eteachers = #{eteachers}, remarks = #{remarks}, huojiang=#{huojiang}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t.* FROM gcontest_error t WHERE t.imp_id = #{impid} order by t.create_date
